Key Match Events: India won the match by 47 runs
Suryakumar Yadav top-scored for India with 53 off 28 balls
Jasprit Bumrah took 3-7 and Arshdeep Singh 3-36 for India
Pre-Game Insights: India captain Rohit Sharma said they understood the conditions and planned accordingly
Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan said they knew they'd be chasing 160-170 and could have executed smarter
Post-Match Reflections: India captain Rohit Sharma said everyone came in and did their job, critical for the team's success
Afghanistan captain Rashid Khan said they could have done it had they executed smarter
Miscellaneous Highlights: There were ten catches in the match
India's bowlers put the breaks on Afghanistan's batting
The match was played in Barbados as part of the ICC Men's T20 World Cup
